content.value:
A walk in the opposite direction to the seemingly disposable-in-24hrs content (stories/fleets/et al.)

As social media wants you to focus on disappearing, faster content; I want to know whether you've really considered the cost of losing, even these fleeting moments, to time? ðŸ¤”
